no-treat-warnings-as-errors.description: Disables setting TreatWarningsAsErrors. Nullable reference type errors will only be shown as warnings and not break the build.

no-test-internals.description: Disables setting InternalsVisibleTo for an accompanying test project called '$(AssemblyName).Tests'.

choices.description: Do not use special packaging for dotnet publish.
Produce a single output file and perform tree shaking. Requires special attention during testing!

trimming.description: Sets the options PublishSingleFile or PublishTrimmed.

ready-to-run.description: Sets the option PublishReadyToRun. Can only be set with trimming=single-file or trimming=trimmed. Requires building on the correct target runtime (see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-3-0#readytorun-images).
